data.title: Synaptid Sea Cucumbers; Apodida
data.meta_description: The Synaptid Sea Cucumbers have soft, highly flexible bodies which are mainly water-filled.
data.text:
The Synaptid Sea Cucumbers have soft, highly flexible bodies which are mainly water-filled. In common with other Sea Cucumbers they seem to eat anything, so you can find them at most of our dive sites ‚Äì but only on the reef itself.

Chaloklum Diving

225 Google reviews

It was our first diving experience and we couldn‚Äòt have wished for a better diving school. Our instructor Michi was very competent with years of experience. He explained everything thoroughly and answered all our questions. We felt safe and well cared for throughout the whole day. We can totally recommend Chaloklum diving.

Hier hei√üt Profession Berufung und nicht Gesch√§ft machen! Das merkt man in jeder Beziehung! Julian Budach

Eine bessere Tauchschule h√§tten wir nicht w√§hlen k√∂nnen. Wir f√ºhlten uns von an Beginn in guten H√§nden. Aufgrund meiner Arbeit konnte ich nicht unter der Woche tauchen, was aber gar kein Problem darstellte. Sie sind uns sehr entgegen gekommen und wir konnten Open Water Schein √ºber zwei Wochenenden absolvieren. 100% empfehlenswert. Eins sticht aber vorwiegend raus: Das ist noch eine Tauchschule, die f√ºr das Tauchen lebt. In allem was wir gelernt haben, hat man gemerkt, dass Michi und Nick mit vollem Herzen dabei sind, sodass das Lernen richtig Spass macht. Danke!

A R

Wir haben bei Chaloklum Diving den Open Water Dive Course absolviert - f√ºr mich war es dabei das allererste Mal tauchen √ºberhaupt. Obwohl ich anfangs doch stark mit meinen inneren √Ñngsten zu k√§mpfen hatte, hat mich Michael super souver√§n, geduldig und verst√§ndnisvoll zum Tauchen selbst in tr√ºbsten Wasser gebracht und der Dive am SailRock war der kr√∂nende Abschluss, den ich tats√§chlich entspannt und ruhig genie√üen konnte. Die Qualit√§t, das fundierte Fachwissen und die erl√§uternden Anekdoten geben einen bereits von Anfang an ein gutes Gef√ºhl und viel Wissen an die Hand, der Kurs war mit maximal 4 Sch√ºlern auf zwei Lehrer (danke auch an Alex an dieser Stelle) Luxus und die Ausstattung sowie Beratung top! Das famili√§re Klima durch Nick und sein Team rundet das Ganze perfekt ab - absolute Empfehlung und bis hoffentlich bald!

Robert Hansen

We completed the Open Water course with instructor Michael 25th July 2024 and had a great experience! Our instructor was very helpful, great teacher and made us feel very comfortable. Finished off the course in decent conditions on Sail Rock and having started the course with some apprehension about diving, but at the end I was very comfortable.

Yael Alperovich

I am a dive master and i went with them on fun dives to sail rock. This is a professional and very experienced diving center that will go above and beyond for their customers. James was a great guide and Nick the owner of the shop took the time to help me trying to solve a problem i had with my equipment. I highly recommend them.

D G

Such a great experience diving with Chaloklum Diving. We're a group with varying diving experience levels, and we were allocated to diferent instructors who were all enthusiastic, skilled and safe and tailored their advice and assistance to the level of their group . The company's communication via email and what's app beforehand was really helpful, especially for several days before we dived when the weather forecast was looking a bit ominous -it was clear that Nick was keen to ensure our safety and comfort and he was reassuringly honest about the situation and open to the idea of cancelling or rescheduling if required (although thankfully that wasn't needed in the end). The dives themselves were at Sail Rock which was fabulous. Warm sea, teeming with fish, good visibility, minimal current. World class. We loved every minute of the whole experience. Thanks to Nick, James, Mishi and Alex for everything.

Brendan Board

Was fortunate to do my Nitrox certification with Nick - he was extremely responsive, set the course up with PADI's e-Learning platform to maximise the time I could spend diving and went over and above to clarify a technical question I had that was beyond the syllabus. Also enjoyed a couple of great dives at Sail Rock with James. Look forward to coming back!
